text:
‘What?’  
‘Where she’s gone and when she’ll be back.’  
‘Damn it all! We might ask.’  
He tugged at the door-handle again.  
‘Nothing to be done. We must go!’  
‘Stay!’ the young man said.  
‘Do you see how the door shakes?’  
‘Well?’  
‘It’s not locked, just fastened with a hook! Hear it clank?’  
‘So?’  
‘That means someone is home!’  
‘What are they doing in there?’ Koch asked, shaking the door.  
‘Don’t pull at it!’ the young man warned.  
‘They might have fainted or…’  
‘Let’s fetch the porter. He can wake them up.’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man deduces that someone is home despite the door not being opened, prompting a decision to fetch the porter for assistance.
